summary: The implementation successfully delivers all requested requirements. The website features a comprehensive orange-themed layout with hero section, product showcase (earbuds and smartwatch), partner logos (YouTube, Bharat Ke Founder, MX Player), Coming Soon on Blinkit section, and contact footer. The founder name 'Yash Jaiswal' and company name 'Zayora' are prominently displayed. All images are properly referenced from the /assets/generated/ path. Contact information (9919031626 and zayora11@gmail.com) is correctly implemented with appropriate formatting and mailto link. The orange color scheme is consistently applied throughout using custom Tailwind configuration with OKLCH color values.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution footer with UTM tracking parameters
hallucinated_features.reason: The ContactFooter component includes a 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution link with UTM tracking parameters. This feature was not requested in the BuildRequest.

The implementation includes comprehensive dark mode styling throughout index.css and tailwind.config.js with .dark class selectors and dark mode color tokens. Dark mode was not requested in the BuildRequest.

The implementation includes full Internet Identity authentication hooks and providers (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts) and integration in main.tsx. Authentication was explicitly listed as a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Quick Links navigation section in footer
hallucinated_features.reason: The ContactFooter includes a 'Quick Links' section with navigation to Products and Contact. This additional navigation was not specified in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Product features list on product cards
hallucinated_features.reason: Product cards display feature lists (e.g., 'Active Noise Cancellation', 'Health Monitoring') which were not specified in the requirements. Only product images were requested.
